metadata.name: Linux Doas Tool Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the doas tool execution in linux host platform. This utility tool allow standard users to perform tasks as root, the same way sudo does.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/doas')))

output.summary: Detects the doas tool execution in linux host platform. This utility tool allow standard users to perform tasks as root, the same way sudo does.
